advantagesValue1: Conduct high-speed and reliable transactions without worrying about the security of your digital assets
advantagesValue2: A simple and functional interface that will be understandable to everyone
advantagesValue3: Get bonuses for every friend you invite
bannerH2: Become part of the NeFT community
benefitsValue1: Flexible settings/Wide range of settings that can help you create customized collections/Powerful functionality/Many functions that don't put you in a box in one mini-application
benefitsValue2: Trends/Popular collections stand out from others with their mint statistics for the past hour/Activities/Access to the list of transactions for each collection/Status/Stay aware of the availability of collections

motivationP: The application uses the TON blockchain, opening up new opportunities for artists, investors and NFT experts.
